is-path-in-cwd

Check if a path is in the current working directory

Install 

$ npm install --save is-path-in-cwd

Usage 

var isPathInCwd = require('is-path-in-cwd');

isPathInCwd('unicorn');
//=> true

isPathInCwd('../rainbow');
//=> false

isPathInCwd('.');
//=> false
